com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Class Tokeniser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.Tokeniser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotator<Sentence>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatternTokeniser, SimpleTokeniser

    public abstract class Tokeniser
extends java.lang.Object
implements Annotator<Sentence>
    A Tokeniser splits a sentence up into tokens (parsing units).

    It adds annotations of type TokenBoundary to the sentence, which are guaranteed not to overlap.

    The Tokeniser must recognise the following annotations in the sentence provided:
    • TokenPlaceholder: will get replaced by a token.
    • TokenAttribute: will add attributes to all tokens contained within its span.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      • tokeniseWithDecisions

        public java.util.List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> tokeniseWithDecisions(java.lang.String text)
                                                                   throws TalismaneException,
                                                                          java.io.IOException
        Tokenise a given sentence. More specifically, return up to N most likely tokeniser decision sequences, each of which breaks up the sentence into a different a list of tokens. Note: we assume duplicate white-space has already been removed from the sentence prior to calling the tokenise method, e.g. multiple spaces have been replaced by a single space.
        Parameters:
        text - the sentence to be tokenised
        Returns:
        a List of up to n TokeniserDecisionTagSequence, ordered from most probable to least probable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TalismaneException

      • tokeniseWithDecisions

        public java.util.List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence sentence,
                                                                          java.lang.String... labels)
                                                                   throws TalismaneException,
                                                                          java.io.IOException
        Similar to tokeniseWithDecisions(String), but the text to be tokenised is contained within a Sentence object.
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence to tokenise
        labels - the labels to add to any annotations added.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TalismaneException
